org.apache.lucene.analysis.tokenattributes
Interface PayloadAttribute

All Superinterfaces:
Attribute
All Known Implementing Classes:
PayloadAttributeImpl, Token
public interface PayloadAttribute
extends Attribute

The payload of a Token. See also Payload.
